idea-plugin.name: Recent Projects Tree
idea-plugin.description:
Recent Projects Tree View

Organize your Recent Projects menu into tree view.

This plugin adds a new action to the File menu that shows your recent projects in a directory tree view, making it easier to navigate large collections of projects that share common folder structures. The common part of the tree (if there is any) is removed for easier usage.

Features

  • Groups recent projects by their directory structure in a tree view
  • Skips the currently open project to reduce clutter
  • Works with the built-in Recent Projects list

Where to find it in the IDE

  • Open IntelliJ IDEA (or any IntelliJ-based IDE)
  • Go to: File â†’ Recent Projects Tree
